Question.Subject: What site can I find this?
Question.Content:
Hi, do you know any site that can give me tips on creative writing and where I can also post my stories, poems, and everything else?
Thanks so much. :)
Question.ChosenAnswer: Hi there. I have a good place where you can get started. Write about a hast of topics, be creative, stats about how many readers you have, earn points, you can even earn a little bit of money through royalties. Just follow the link and sign up - it's very quick and free. Very clean and easy to navigate site. Text editor, upload pictures, save drafts online - more than your average blog. http://www.wikinut.com/in/unmi/ Hope this helps and happy writing ;-)
